featured.text: Delicious dishes can be prepared only D.…to throw away their toy guns and knives.
Specifically, you will learn to prepare __(23)__ delicious items as roasted chicken, chili, turkey loaf, turkey loaf, meatballs, pasta, among others.

definition.zh_def: 美味的，令人愉悅的味道或食物。
definition.en_def: Highly pleasant to the taste; flavorful.
definition.example: The cake was so delicious that I couldn't resist having a second piece.
